title: Room in Kecamatan Kuta, Indonesia
description:
## About this space

Nice & Easy is our comfort of room, complete with a generously sized bathroom and bed, for your convenience. Plenty natural ventilation that fills the room with fresh air, along with a beautiful local hand made ceiling.

The Easy room, also known as Room 6, is the guarantee to a refreshing and stress free time in Bali. Enjoy out social area and pool at your door or take a short walk to the beach.

## The space

üèõ Room 06 ‚Äì Nice & Easy Room

Enjoy the cute yet small room's spaciousness and comfort, which comes with a roomy bathroom. Your stay will be enjoyable and restful, simple and refreshing due to lots of windows and nature integrated features.

**Features:**
- ‚úî Sleep soundly on the cozy queen-sized bed
- ‚úî Fan and air conditioning available
- ‚úî Pillows, Linens, and Sheets
- ‚úî Closet with Hangers and Shelves
- ‚úî Cabinet with Spacious Drawers
- ‚úî Outside seating area to enjoy the cool breeze
otherRules: If you come at night between 9 PM till 6 AM we can arrange that someone checks you in for an additional fee of 15 USD.
